item.text: (a) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 大般若經第十六部
\u0fd3\u0fd4\u0fd4/ ! /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
gti mug la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang
ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /
zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /gzugs la
yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'du shes la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'du byed la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /

myig la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rna ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sna la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lce la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lus la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /yid la yongs su spyod
pa myed do/ /gzugs la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sgra la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /dri la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /ro la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /reg la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /chos
la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /
lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa la
yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lus kyi

'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /chu'i khams la
yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /mye'i khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams
la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'du byed la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa la

yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /reg pa la yongs yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sred

pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /len pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /srid pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /skye ba la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rga shi la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa

myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid

la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong

pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /thog

ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod

pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams la
yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu

la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la
yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su myed do/ /so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yongs

su spyod pa myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /

dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /

rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan
nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur la 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang
myi gda' na lam bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs
par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma
mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags
sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /
'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta
bu/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni
gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las
'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am myi
dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmyigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de
bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta
bur shes so/ /mthong ngo rtogs so/ /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /mthong ngo rtogs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams

cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs la sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/
bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/ tshad myed pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos

sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu la spyod pa lags/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /
sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs myed par/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa myi spyod de/ rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams
cad sprul pa lta bur myi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs myed par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ myig yor lta bu/
sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
sems can rnams gyen du skyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni mying dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag mying dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyod do/ /gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das mying ni gang lags/
mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ mying zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi mying gis sgro btags pa'o/ /'di lta
ste mying zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes
bya ba 'am/ bud myed ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes
bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ myi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun
tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba
'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i mying gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor mying ni thams cad mying gi don kyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang
la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni mying tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
mkhas pas mying thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig /chos thams cad stong pa la
mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi byed do zhes skul bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no/ /rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
gzugs rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas gzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan
ma zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/ mtshan mar gzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba
ste/ 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas

mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing mtshan ma myed pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o/ /'di ni mtshan ma myed pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su myi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing
gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol
zhing / mtshan ma myed pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni mying tsam du bas te/ mying dang mtshan mar bas la/ btags pa
tsam du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang
dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems
can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang myi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i
mtshan ma yang myed/ dngos po yang myed pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed
pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i
tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis tshad myed pa bzhi
yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs

par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /

mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis chen po

stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /

mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i
tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa

nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs
su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs
su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis
ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i
tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma myed pa dran pa myed pa/ yid la byed pa myed pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur te/
sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par myi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor zag pa myed pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa dran pa myed pa yid la
byed pa myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams
cad kyi don byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i
chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/ /'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i
chos so/ /'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang
bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma myed pa'ang gzhan la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/
mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma myed pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma myed pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /
phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/ /
bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos
thams cad mtshan ma myed pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myed pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du dge ba'i chos thams

cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma myed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba
myed pa ni smon pa myed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste rnam par thard pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis
la slob pa yin/ khams bcwo brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos
thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob
pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
pa myed pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu la slob pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i
phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu
shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so/ /de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste
dper na/ dbu ba'i phung po snying po myed pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu gseg tshags dang / shin tu snying po myed par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar

gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing / gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma

'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi
'gag 'ong ba myed/ 'gro ba myed kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de

bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing / 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/

de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste

gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni
myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa

ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig rgyu la chu myi dmyigs pa ltar shes pa ste/

de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing / gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas gang nas kyang myi 'ong

gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin
ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste
dper na/ chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/ snying po shin tu myi dmyigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du

byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing / gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/

de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ kun nas
nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces
bya'o/ /de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed cing /
gang du yang 'gro ba myed pas/ gang nas kyang myi 'ongs gang du yang myi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig
pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni myi skye myi 'gag 'ong ba myed 'gro ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na rnam
par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong
par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ myig gi khams kyang myig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i khams

kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
gyis stong ngo / /sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par
shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i rnam par shes
pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin
gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /zhes bya bar shes pa

ste/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba myed par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gag pa myed pa dang /
chad pa myed pa dang / rtag pa myed pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi
bar shes pa de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung
ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa
yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su myed pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya
bar shes pa yin no/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa
yin no/ /ji ltar na sdug bsngal kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin no/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa
dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i
chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par myi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la
zhig yod na ni/ rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmyigs so/ /gal te dmyigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang
rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang myi dmyigs so/ /de ltar ma dmyigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa myed do/ /
rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/
dbyer myed pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang /
'dus ma byas kyi chos te chos thams cad do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la slob pas/
chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji ltar gzugs la bslabs par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/

ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar

phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji

ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par
bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la
bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji
ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba
la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab bgyi/ ji ltar
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/

ji ltar tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji

ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji

ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung
che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du
shes myed pa'i sems can gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha'
yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/

ji ltar chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang myi
skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa
bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/
ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems can
yongs su smyin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslab shing / chos thams cad
rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ myig la bslab par bgyi/
rna ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna la bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab
par bgyi/ dri la bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par
shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te
reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par
bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la
bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sa'i khams la bslab par
bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ mye'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes
pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mying dang gzugs la bslab par
bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa
la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong
pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la
bslab par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ myi dmyigs pa stong
pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran
pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/
stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad myed pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/
rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
myed pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje
chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab
par bgyi/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/ myi spro ba spros par
bgyid par myi 'gyur lags grang // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la
ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du
shes so/ /'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed
do/ /rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid

kyang myig go/ /rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna yang chos kyi
dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na
yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so/ /yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/ /
reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/ /chos kyang
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa
yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig
gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i rnam
par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par
shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid
kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos
kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi

dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mye'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
te/ mye'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed
do/ /rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mying dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /

chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
tshor ba'o/ /sred pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa
yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ len pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags/ srid pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba
las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga shi las gud na yang chos kyi
dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las

gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid

kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /
phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang

phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings

so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang
chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/

don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong
pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings

ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha
ma myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma

myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong
pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las
gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong

pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings

so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na
yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang

po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs rnams kyang chos kyi

dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma

lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /lam yang chos kyi

dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags

pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
lags/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang chos kyi

dbyings ma lags/ tshad myed pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi

dbyings nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar

pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
smon pa myed pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings
ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las
gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las
gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /so so
yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so yang
dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig par rnams so/ /
byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang
chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /
dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings
nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/ /gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes
pa'o/ /myig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig go/ /rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o/ /lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so/ /yid
nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o/ /ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/ /chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i
rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te

reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor ba nyid kyang chos

kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang
chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang

chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi
dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
sred pa'o/ /len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o/ /srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid kyang

chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos

kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus
