gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te rang bzhin stong
pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur
ro/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong
ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos
thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma
yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang
bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /
gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rang
bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par 'gyur na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'jig par myi 'gyur
rtag pa ma yin te/ phyis myed par 'gro ba yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yul na yang myi gnas/ phyogs na yang myi gnas pa ste/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin/ gang
du 'gro ba yang ma yin te/ de ni chos gnas pa nyid do/ /de la ni chos gang la yang 'phel ba dmyigs pa 'am/ 'grib pa dmyigs pa 'am/ 'gog pa dmyigs pa 'am/ skye ba
dmyigs pa 'am/ 'byung ba dmyigs pa 'am/ 'gag pa dmyigs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmyigs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dmyigs pa myed do/ /de ni chos rnams
kyi rang bzhin te/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ chos gang
yang 'jug pa 'am/ myi 'jug par mthong ba myed do/ /chos thams cad ni 'jug pa myed cing gnas pa myed pa ste/ de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o/ /de bas na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas bla na myed pa yang dag pa na rdzogs pa'i
byang chub las phyir myi ldog go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ chos thams cad ni sgrib pa myed par yang dag par
rjes su mthong ngo / /de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag myi dmyigs/ bdag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sems can myi dmyigs/ sems cad du gdags pa
yang myi dmyigs/ srog myi dmyigs/ srog tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'gro ba yang myi dmyigs/ 'gro bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gso' ba yang myi dmyigs/
gso' bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ skyes bur yang myi dmyigs/ skyes bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gang zag kyang myi dmyigs/ gang zag du gdags pa yang myi
dmyigs/ shed can yang myi dmyigs/ shed can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shed bdag kyang myi dmyigs/ shed bdag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byed pa po yang myi dmyigs/
byed pa por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba po yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba por gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar byed pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar byed par gdags
pa yang myi dmyigs/ slong bar yang myi dmyigs/ slong bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ kun nas slong bar yang myi dmyigs/ kun nas slong bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
shes pa po yang myi dmyigs/ shes pa por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mthong ba po yang myi dmyigs/ mthong ba por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/
gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du shes kyang myi dmyigs/ 'du shes su
gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes par gdags pa yang
myi dmyigs/ myig kyang myi dmyigs/ myig du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba yang myi dmyigs/ rna bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna yang myi dmyigs/ snar gdags
pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce yang myi dmyigs/ lcer gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyang myi dmyigs/ lus su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyang myi dmyigs/
yid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sgra yang myi dmyigs/ sgrar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dri
yang myi dmyigs/ drir gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ro yang myi dmyigs/ ror gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg kyang myi dmyigs/ reg du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i
rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang
myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par
shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/
myig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi
'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang mi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang mi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
ba yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang mi dmyigs/ sa'i khams kyang mi dmyigs/ sa'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
chu'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ chu'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mye'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ mye'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyang
myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i
khams kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ma rig pa yang myi dmyigs/ ma rig par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi
dmyigs/ 'du byed du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/
mying dang gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug kyang myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg par
gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sred pa yang myi dmyigs/ sred par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs len pa
yang myi dmyigs/ len par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ srid pa yang myi dmyigs/ srid par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ skye ba yang myi dmyigs/ skye bar gdags pa yang
myi dmyigs/ rga shi yang myi dmyigs/ rga shir gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa yang
myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi
dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang mi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid du gdags
pa yang myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags
pa yang myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags
pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong
pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma
myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa
yang myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang mi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/
myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
kyang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang
myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ yang dag par
spong bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ dbang por
gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ stobs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag
du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan du gdags pa yang myi
dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ tshad myed par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes
pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi
sgo rnams kyang mi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgor gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su
gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ so so
yang dag par rig par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen po yang myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po yang myi dmyigs/
snying rje chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/
rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi
dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang byang chub kyang myi dmyigs/ rang byang chub tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi
dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa yang
myi dmyigs so/ /myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang myi dmyigs/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dpe' byad bzang po
brgyad cu yang myi dmyigs/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tsom za bar 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong /
rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyun tu
chos bstan na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa de dag la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba lta yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/
phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
chos thams cad la dngos po myed na/ sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/
phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya ste/ gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs
su 'khris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log myed pa la gzhog go/ /'dul lo/ /rab tu 'god do/ /phyin ci log gang yin pa de yang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir/ phyin ci log ma yin

pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa ni phyin ci log ma yin pa'o/ /gang la phyin ci log myed pa de la bdag myed do/ /sems can myed do/ /srog myed do/ /'gro ba myed do/ /gso ba myed do/ /skyes bu myed do/ /gang zag

myed do/ /shed can myed do/ /shed bdag myed do/ /byed pa po myed do/ /tshor ba po myed do/ /shes pa po myed do/ /mthong ba myed do/ /de la gzugs myed do/ /tshor ba myed do/ /'du shes myed do/ /'du byed myed do/ /rnam par

shes pa myed do/ /de la myig myed do/ /rna ba myed do/ /sna myed do/ /lce myed do/ /lus myed do/ /yid myed do/ /de la gzugs myed do/ /sgra myed do/ /dri myed do/ /ro myed do/ /reg myed do/ /chos myed do/ /de la myig

gi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /de la myig

gi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /de la myig gi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /de la sa'i khams myed do/ /chu'i khams myed do/ /mye'i khams myed do/ /rlung gi khams
myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do/ /de la ma rig pa myed do/ /'du byed myed do/ /rnam par shes pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs myed do/ /
skye mched drug myed do/ /reg pa myed do/ /tshor ba myed do/ /sred pa myed do/ /len pa myed do/ /skye ba myed do/ /rga shi myed do/ /de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do/ /tshul

khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rold

tu phyind pa myed do/ /de la nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid myed

do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /rang

bzhin stong pa nyid myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do/ /dbang po
rnams myed do/ /stobs rnams myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do/ /de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do/ /bsam
gtan rnams myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do/ /de la rnam par thar pa rnams myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do/ /de la
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed do/ /byams pa chen po myed do/ /snying rje chen po myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myed do/ /de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myed do/ /rang byang chub myed do/ /
thams cad shes pa nyid myed do/ /de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ gang la gzugs myed pa
dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / gang la myig myed pa dang / rna ba myed pa dang / sna myed pa dang / lce myed pa dang /
lus myed pa dang / yid myed pa dang / gang la gzugs myed pa dang / sgra myed pa dang / dri myed pa dang / ro myed pa dang / reg myed pa dang / chos myed pa dang / gang la myig gi rnam par
shes pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam
par shes pa myed pa dang / gang la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang /
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / gang la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa
dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / gang la sa'i khams myed pa dang / chu'i khams myed pa dang / mye'i khams myed pa dang / rlung gi khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang /
rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / gang la ma rig pa myed pa dang / 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / skye mched drug myed pa dang /

reg pa myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / sred pa myed pa dang / len pa myed pa dang / srid pa myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / rga shi myed pa dang / gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed
pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / gang la nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong
pa nyid myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid myed pa dang / gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed pa dang / dbang po rnams myed
pa dang / stobs rnams myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa dang / gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed pa dang /
bsam gtan rnams myed pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed pa dang / gang la rnam par thar pa rnams myed pa dang / mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myed pa dang /
ting nge 'dzin rnams myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed pa dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
pa rnams myed pa dang / byams pa chen po myed pa dang / snying rje chen po myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myed pa dang / gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myed pa dang / rang byang chub myed pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed
pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod cing / sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel te/ gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel to/ /gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes las 'grel to/ /
zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to/ /gang zag pa myed pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden
pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po

de dag kyang de la don dam pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /de ni sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de la bdag myed do/ /sems can myed do/ /srog myed do/ /skye ba po myed do/ /gso' ba po myed do/ /skyes bu myed do/ /gang zag myed do/ /shed can myed do/ /
shed bdag myed do/ /byed pa po myed do/ /tshor ba po myed do/ /shes pa po myed do/ /mthong ba po myed do/ /gzugs myed do/ /tshor ba myed do/ /'du shes myed do/ /'du byed myed do/ /rnam par shes pa

myed do/ /myig myed do/ /rna ba myed do/ /sna myed do/ /lce myed do/ /lus myed do/ /yid myed do/ /gzugs myed do/ /sgra myed do/ /dri myed do/ /ro myed do/ /reg myed do/ /chos myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes
pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /myig
gi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /sa'i khams myed do/ /chu'i khams myed do/ /mye'i khams myed do/ /rlung gi
khams myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do/ /ma rig pa myed do/ /'du byed myed do/ /rnam par shes pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs myed do/ /

skye mched drug myed do/ /reg pa myed do/ /tshor ba myed do/ /sred pa myed do/ /len pa myed do/ /srid pa myed do/ /skye ba myed do/ /rga shi myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /

nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid
myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /rang bzhin stong

pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do/ /dbang
po rnams myed do/ /stobs rnams myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do/ /bsam
gtan rnams myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa dgu myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / /mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed
do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myed do/ /byams pa chen po myed do/ /snying rje chen po myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myed do/ /myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis myed do/ /dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa myed de/ rang bzhin stong

pa nyid de yang snga nas kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid phyin chad kyang rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de/ de nam yang rang bzhin gyis myi stong pa ma yin no/ /
de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can du 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can
gyi 'du shes yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do/ /de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / lam thams cad la spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/ sems can yongs su

smyin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ de tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bla na

myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta ste/ rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rgyun myi gcod do/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji

snyed gcig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par gzhan la 'jig rten du 'byung bar myi

'gyur ro/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyi chos thams cad la spyod cing / gzugs kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'du shes kyang
gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'du byed kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /
myig kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rna ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sna yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lce
yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lus kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /yid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no/ /gzugs kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sgra yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dri yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang gzhan no/ /ro yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /reg kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /chos kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /
sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lus kyi
rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa
yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sa'i khams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /chu'i khams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /mye'i khams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rlung gi khams kyang
gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan no/ /rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /ma rig pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'du byed kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rnam par shes pa yang gzhan
no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /skye mched drug kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /
reg pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /tshor ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sred pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan no/ /len pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /srid pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /skye ba yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan no/ /rga shi yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan no/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'dus byas stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang

gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dngos

po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams

kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dbang po rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan no/ /stobs rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
brgyad pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /mngon par shes pa
rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan no/ /rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /byams pa chen po yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /snying rje
chen po yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
'bras bu yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu

yang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang byang chub kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /lam gyi rnam

pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par

'khrugs par mi bgyid kyi/ gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor

ba'o/ /'du shes nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig go/ /rna ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ /sna nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'o/ /lce nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'o/ /

lus nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus so/ /yid nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o/ /dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dri'o/ /

ro nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ro'o/ /reg nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go/ /chos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /

lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong

pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /sa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /chu'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyang chu'i khams so/ /mye'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so/ /rlung gi khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
rlung gi khams so/ /nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so/ /skye mched drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /len pa

nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang len pa nyid do/ /srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /skye ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /rga shi nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid

do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa

pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang

chen po stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang

myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong

pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ /stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bsam gtan nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams

so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir myi

'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra

bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar spyod
pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myig kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang gzhan/ sna yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid
kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dri yang gzhan la/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ro yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ reg kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong
pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan
la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mye'i khams
kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug
kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa yang
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ len pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba yang gzhan la/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ don dam

pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos

po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba

rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyang
gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa
nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
brgyad kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/

rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yin te/ gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo

zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal

te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab
'byor gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na
myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te rnam par shes pa
rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang

gi phyir rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te myig gi rang bzhin stong pa zhig ma yin ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir myig rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong

du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te sna rang bzhin gyis
stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sna

rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te lce rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lce rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas
shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te lus rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lus rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po yang lus rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te yid rang bzhin gyis stong

pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te

gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ /rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs

rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te dri rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dri rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rang bzhin

gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te ro rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir ro rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po ro rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te reg rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir reg rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te chos rang bzhin

gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir chos rang bzhin

gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong

ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang

smon pa myed pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/

rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

gal te mngon par shes pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/

rab 'byor gang gi phyir mngon par shes pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par

byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te gzungs

kyi sgo rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi

phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya'o/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi

rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir myi 'jigs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud

par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/

de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te byams pa chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir byams pa chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po rang bzhin gyis

stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te snying rje chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir snying rje chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pas

na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes

bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/

de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du
chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te dgra bcom pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dgra bcom pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra bcom pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

gal te rang byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor

gang gi phyir rang byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa

shes pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rang bzhin

gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor gal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par
byed de/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am/ rtag tu gnas pa 'am/ 'gro ba myed de/ gzhan du na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud
dang tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams 'di ni gzugs so/ /bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs dang ldan no/ /'di ni tshor ba'o/ /bdag gi tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis tshor ro/ /'di ni 'du shes
