kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la dgod do/ /ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dbang po rnams la dgod do/ /ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang
stobs rnams bsgoms par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang stobs rnams la dgod do/ /ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la dgod do/ /sems can thams cad kyang
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la dgod do/ /ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

brgyad pa la dgod do/ /ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dgod do snyam ste/ de de ltar sems pa'i tshe/ de snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang myi 'bral ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa

bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dag dang myi 'bral bar shog shig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/ /rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ de nas bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur kyi bar du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ de bdag nyid kyis lus kyang mdzes pa yin/ de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin/
sems can de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa yin te/ de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin/ sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smyin
par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/ yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub ste/ rab 'byor byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed do/ /ci nas kyang ngan song gsum du gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / lta ba rnam par gdags pa'i mying yang
myi srid pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug du gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / bud myed dang / skyes par gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / theg pa gnyis su gdags

pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag myed par gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / bdag dang

bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / 'bras bu gdags

pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / gzhan du na sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/ phyi nang gi dngos po dag las 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i

sgra dang / smon pa myed pa'i sgra dang / myi skye myi 'gag pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / chos de dag gi ngo bo
nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/ ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rang ste/ chos thams chos thams cad kyis stong ngo / /gang

stong pa de la ni mtshan ma myed do/ /gang la mtshan ma myed pa de la ni smon pa myed do zhes bya bar chos bstan pa'i sgra nyid mtshan rgyun myi chad par 'gro yang rung / 'dug kyang rang / sdod kyang rung / nyan yang

rung ste/ rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo / /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
bzhugs pa de thams cad legs pa rjod par 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des chos bstan pa na/ sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so/ /'di ni chos ma yin no zhes bya bar the tsom za bar

myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos ma yin pa gang yang myed de/ thams cad kyang chos so/ /de la sems can gang myi dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa dang /

sangs rgyas sam sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa bdag tu lta bar bying ba nas lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba/ rtag pa 'am chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/
log par 'dzin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa la yang chos so zhes zer/ chos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/ de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/
de ltar chos spangs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par
'grol te/ de ltar rnam par bkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu 'god de/ der bkod pa rnams phyin cad ngan song du ltung bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
sam/ zag pa myed pa'i chos sam/ 'dus byas kyi chos sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par myi 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyur ro/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu bdun no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes bgyi 'am/ ma nges shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/ ma nges
pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ phung po gang du nges pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas
kyi phung por nges pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes bgyi 'am/ 'on tam phyir myi ldog pa nges shes bgyi 'am/ 'o na
tam srid pa tha ma pa nges shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o/ /phyir myi ldog pa ni nges pa'o/ /srid
pa cig gis thog pa ni nges pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram/ myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du myi skye'o/ /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ brgyad pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan
cig phyir 'ong 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson

'grus rtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i don du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas myed do/ /lha tshe
ring por skye ba'i gnas myed do/ /gang na dge ba'i chos rnams myi spyod pa de lta bu skye ba'i gnas myed do/ /glen pa dang lkug par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas myed do/ /mtha'

'khob kyi kla klo dang myi srun zhing 'khor bzhi rgyur myed pa'i yul du skye ba'i gnas myed do/ /log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas myed do/ /gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra myi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra myi grag pa

dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra myi grag pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas myed do/ /bya ba ma yin pa'i lta bar ltung ba'i gnas myed do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/

bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa ni/ myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / tshul dang myi 'dra ba'i gnas su myi skye ba lags na/ gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa'i

rabs bstan na/ de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa

ma yin gyi/ lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing / sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su 'dzin cing / rab 'byor de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing / de la la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang / bla na myed pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing / sems can de dag la gnod par
myi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag /dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems

can rnams kyi phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / byol song gi skye gnas su skye yang byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes
pas myi gos par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/ bcol ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang zhig yod de/ de dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ bla na

myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang
yang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu myed de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de lta
bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/ de la bslabs na/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'phags
pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa
'phags pa zag pa myed pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das de de lags/ bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing zag pa myi mnga' ba'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing / de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam myed/ gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas par 'gyur ram/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa dang
ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smyin par byed do/ /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom
pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing / las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das de de bzhin
te/ mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta
bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/ /de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du 'ang myi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su
myi myong ngo / /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/ gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam
pa sna tshogs bstan na/ de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs sam/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan du 'ang 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcol ldan
'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa yang
ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gi sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang myed do/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol
pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang de ltar ldan zhing lus gang dang gang gis sems can
rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste/ de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang / las de lta bus myi gos par spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/ thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs
re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang la reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar

chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par myi byed do/ /stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la yang reg par myi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyis kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so/ /de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la myi gnas kyi/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ba' zhig la gnas shing / rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos gang
yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ ji ltar shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su chud pa 'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis myi stong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das stong ngo / /bcol ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad
chos thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so/ /bcol ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis

'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa gang
la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo / /'jig
rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo / /gzhan du na mying dang brda'
gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/ gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong la/ sangs rgyas bcol ldan

'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong ste/ gdags pa'i rgyu de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong pa zhig yin na ni/ nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyi tshe ba ma yin no/ /de'i phyir chos thams
cad chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / lha'i myig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang / 'chi 'pho shes pa mngon

par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa myed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de tshol ba'i tshe/ lha'i

myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong / gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba myed do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing / ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba myed de/ stong pa nyid ni ro myong bar byed
pa myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
lha'i myig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo/ /las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la
chos ston te/ sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa myed de/ de ltar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes pas bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos

sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston cing / sbyin pa byin cig /phongs

pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
phongs pas zil kyis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar pa gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos

ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/
sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci
smos kyis/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston cing / sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji
snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/ dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/
de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu skye ba'i gnas
yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji
snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par
smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par
myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos te/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /
sems can sems g.yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam
par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag
cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta
re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes
rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ de ltar shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol
song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod
pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la
sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa la spyod pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan
thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid

kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par myed do zhes chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lta'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho
phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub

sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /sbyin pa byin cig
phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar
gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims

ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci
smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnams par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/
bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun du gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs
par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems

can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo'i ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam
par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon

pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyi le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la
'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i
'jig rten yin te/ de de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni
sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi
skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags

kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor

ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag par lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/

khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos
ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa
yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims
sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed

cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de yang sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/

gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par

gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims

ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par
lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su
gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/
de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed
kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes
bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga'

tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug
bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum
du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re

zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya
bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes

rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi sbyor

ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/

nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/

ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni/ mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa 'am/ smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/
myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i

chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyis don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin

cig /phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang

bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zin kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul
khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus
na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes ston to/ /sems can phan
tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/ dge ba'i chos
gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo
can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par
smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci
smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba can gang ji snyed pa de
dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba te/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig

rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /

phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal
pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/

de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la

sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa'i chos de dag la yang dag

pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis

stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ byang shar kyi phyogs
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab
'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad ma myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi
'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba
ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis
shig /phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par gyur ta re zhes ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang
ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos
te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang
gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston
to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la
dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can
le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam
par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci

smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/
de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /
phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes
rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i
'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod

pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du
chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la
mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /
sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu
rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par
spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par
thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs rnams sam/ so so yang
dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems

can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas
ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil kyis

non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston te/ sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag
tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can
dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/

de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de
dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/ dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems
'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam

gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni

bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song

gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi skabs kyang mi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos

ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am

byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems

'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab
'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can
dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du

gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing

de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la

mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems

can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /
sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig
pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems

can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas
ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil kyis non

cing / nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul
khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin par ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/
byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan don par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i
phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang
ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/ dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed
phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis

'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag
le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam

kyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug
bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang

gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes
rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/
gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal

pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang

ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam sbyor te/

nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/

ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten

kyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/
yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can

de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cing / phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don

lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar

par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan
pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gis skye gnas sam/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims

ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun du gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems
can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis/ 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi
dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los
ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig
rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang
myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/
gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang
gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /
sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal bas ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar
myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed

kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /

zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa
de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed
chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa
myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /
sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag du rdzu 'phrul gyis
song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo

rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag
par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems

can kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag
gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /phongs pas zil kyis non cing

nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to/ /kye skyes bu dag tshul
khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gis don kyang myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/

byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos te/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims
ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na/ khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs
par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi

go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los

khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gnod par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du

gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa
ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis

de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can
dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skyes gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes

chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa

de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag

la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa

myed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyis don byed pa yin no// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug /de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par
thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/

sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/

sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig /phongs pa ni

sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /

phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/
sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan
gdon par lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can phan
tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang
skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas
yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa

lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa
de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/

de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/
gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi

go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ /'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni myi sdug pa la sbyor ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni

byams pa la sbyor ro/ /gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ /lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam

'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid
kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen par myed do zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos bstan par myi nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du bzung bar myi nus so/ /
rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya mdab ma myed pas ni/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar myi nus so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma
brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par myi nus so/ /rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa
rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis/ sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do/ /de lha'i myig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag
gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams

gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag du sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag du song zhing sems can de dag gi sems
sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/
bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi
sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam

'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/

de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin
pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i
gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang

ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin
pa'i gtam 'am tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtam gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i

gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag du sems can gang ji snyed cig

skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul
khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i
gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag du sems gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag
kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gis sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/
tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi
gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag
gi sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/
bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis 'og gi phyogs

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /
sems can de dag gi sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson
'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /des lha'i myig gis steng

gi phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /
sems can de dag gi sems/ sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang 'thun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/
bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/ lha dang myi gnyis ka'i sgra yang thos te/ de shar

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin
to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/
bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang

ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/
de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi
gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji

snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims
kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung
ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag
gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi
gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus gyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar
du chos ston to/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/
thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/
brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de shar lho'i phyogs

mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /
de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gis chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/
de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes
