rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/

sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos

ston to/ /de 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig /chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /
de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to/ /de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston
te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam
'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de sems kyi rnams grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas
shing / de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/
shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/

sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya bar nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar
yang shes te/ sems can sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/
brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
kyis sems rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi
gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /de zag pa myed pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/
de zag pa myed pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/
brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ /
rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par byas te/
de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dres pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su gzung zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi
don byed cing bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par myi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni/ dgos pa thams cad khyed kyang bde ba 'am/
sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pas
rnam par rtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba des phrogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /
rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar mngon par shes pas/ rnam par rtse bar byas te/ ci nas kyang sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar byas te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par ma byas par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
myi nus so/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi yan lag dang myi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed do/ /rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya' bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam
gyi yan lag go/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam
gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la

myi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /'di la yongs su gtong bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sbyin pa'o zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / de tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni tshul khrims so/ /bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /'di'i don tu
tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan

lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog pa ste/ bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o/ /bdag gis bzod pa sgom mo/ /'di'i don tu bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba

las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog

cing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni brtson 'grus so/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo/ /'di'i don tu brtson 'grus brtsam mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i
chos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / de bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni bsam gtan no/ /bdag gis bsam
gtan no/ /bdag gis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/ /'di ni don tu bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag

kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog

cing de shes rab bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo/ /bdag gis ni shes rab bsgom mo/ /'di'i don tu shes rab bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid

la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes

gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/

dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu

phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ phyi stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po

bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de dag la myi rtog cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis

phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di

ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo

nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /

zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar

bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom

par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan

lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis don dam pa stong pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa
ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/

dge ba'i chos 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis
'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba
las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /

de la myi rtog cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /
'di'i don tu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di
ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag
la myi rtog ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar

gzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog
ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag

la myi rtog ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam kyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar

bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /
bdag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor
ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi

rtog cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu rang bzhin
stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /

sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos

thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis

bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /

de la myi rtog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyis phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom bar bya'o/ /'di'i

don tu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag

dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi

phyir 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu myi dmyigs pa sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang gis

bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lan gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing /
dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge

ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba

las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi

rtog cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par

spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /bdag gis yang dag par spong ba
rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol
ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la
myi rtog cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol
ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang

de la myi rtog cing dbang po lnga bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni dbang po rnams so/ /bdag gis dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu dbang po rnams bsgom mo zhes
gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / stobs rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni stobs
rnams so/ /bdag gis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu stobs rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan

lag bdun la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bdag gis byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa'o/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni/ lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir
'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi
rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so/ /bdag
gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu bsam gtan rnams bsgom mo/ /zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang

sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos tshad myed pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing /

tshad myed pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni tshad myed pa rnams so/ /bdag gis tshad myed pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu tshad myed pa rnams bsgom mo zhes

gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ tshad myed pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /

sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe/

ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /bdag gis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/
rnam par thar pa brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa'i
sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgom pa'i
tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par thar

pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smyon pa myed pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de

de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /

sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/
ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de

dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /

bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang

sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing /

gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom
mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /
sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de dag la myi rtog cing / myi 'jigs pa rnams
bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /bdag gis myi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu myi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom
mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ myi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /
sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing /
so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom
par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang / 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po

la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni snying rje chen po'o/ /bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu
snying rje chen po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos
so/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /'di'i don tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag
kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na myed
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad pa de dag /
'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur pa dang / rgal ba dang / rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu brgyad do// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te

chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar zad de/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spang ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad
par de yod do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs pa yang gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes myi bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad myed pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes
brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/ /'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/ /'di ni gshin
rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di ni lha'o/ /'di ni myi'o/ /'di ni rigs kyi sa'o/ /'di ni brgyad pa'o/ /'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o/ /
'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar khyad par dang / rnam
par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmyigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam
par smyin pa yang dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa
la/ las dang las kyi rnams par smyin pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par ma spyad pa 'am/ legs
par ma spyad pa 'am/ myi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du lhung ngo / /legs par spyad pa'i las kyi lha dang myir skye'o/ /nyams pa myed pa'i
las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/

nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyad/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus byas stong
pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang bzhin

stong pa nyid la spyad/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

la spyad/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad/ dbang po rnams la spyad/
stobs rnams la spyad/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad/ bsam gtan rnams la spyad/ tshad myed pa
rnams la spyad/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyad mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad/ myi 'jigs pa
rnams la spyad/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad/ byams pa chen po la spyad/ snying rje chen po la spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyad de/ nyams pa med pa'i

spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par gzhag cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud myi zos shing / rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar
myi ltung ba de ltar don byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gnag po 'am dkar po 'am
gnag pa 'am/ dkar ba 'am/ myi gnag myi dkar ba dmyigs pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste myi dmyigs na/ sems
can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lha dang myir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rgyun tu zhugs par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/
lan cig phyir 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ phyir myi 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ dgra bcom par ji lta gdags pa mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/
byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi 'jug pa ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams nas myi 'grol te/ rab 'byor
sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par myi shes pas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su myi 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das de dag las chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par thos nas/ sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i

skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni myed cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing / sems can myed pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs
myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba myed pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ 'du shes myed pa la 'du shes su 'du shes/ 'du byed myed pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa myed pa la rnam par shes
par 'du shes/ myig myed pa la myig du 'du shes/ rna ba myed pa la rna bar 'du shes/ sna myed pa la snar 'du shes/ lce myed pa la lcer 'du shes/ lus myed pa la lus su 'du shes/ yid myed pa la yid

du 'du shes/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ sgra myed pa la sgrar 'du shes/ dri myed pa la dri 'du shes/ ro myed pa la ror 'du shes/ reg myed pa la reg tu 'du shes/ chos myed pa la chos su 'du shes/

myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa la myig gi rnam par 'du shes/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lce'i

rnam par shes pa myed pa la lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa la lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa la yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/

myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa la myig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la/ sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/

lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ yid kyis 'dus te reg pa myed pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar

'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
tshor bar 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed
pa la/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sa'i khams myed pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/ chu'i khams myed pa la chu'i khams su 'du shes/
mye'i khams myed pa la mye'i khams su 'du shes/ rlung gi khams myed pa la rlung gi khams su 'du shes/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa la nam mkha'i khams su 'du shes/ rnam par shes
pa'i khams myed pa la rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes/ ma rig pa myed pa la ma rig par 'du shes/ 'du byed myed pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa myed pa la rnam par shes par
'du shes/ mying dang gzugs myed pa la/ mying dang gzugs su 'du shes/ skye mched drug myed pa la skye mched drug tu 'du shes/ reg pa myed pa la reg par 'du shes/ tshor ba myed pa la tshor bar
'du shes/ sred pa myed pa la sred par 'du shes/ len pa myed pa la len par 'du shes/ srid pa myed pa la srid par 'du shes/ skye ba myed pa la skye bar 'du shes/
rga shi myed pa la rga shir 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos myed pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos myed pa la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag

pa dang bcas pa'i chos myed pa la/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa myed pa'i chos myed pa la/ zag pa myed pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'dus byas kyi chos myed pa la 'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/

'dus ma byas kyi chos myed pa la/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gis/ phyi ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par

'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su myi 'grol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/ byang chub sems

dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs
su 'grel to// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa
lags na/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs
su 'grel pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas te/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la ston to/ /'chad do/ /'jog go/ /
'god do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'grel to/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yang dag par brjod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyed pa
gang gis dkon mchog gsum rnams par 'god pa de thams cad yongs su 'dus te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig
rten du byung bas/ sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel lo/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las
'da' bar 'gyur / sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal pas yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te lam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da'
ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/ /kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas/ yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da'

ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/ /lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya
ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs ste/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no/ /
kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no/ /lam shes
pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba yang ma
mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal pa yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin

nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings myi nyams/ myi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bden pa khong du chud par ji

ltar bya ba bzhin du/ bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don tu spyod do/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ bden

pa rtogs pa'i don tu spyod pa lags/ ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te/ khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmyigs
su myed pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad myi dmyigs pas bden par rtogs pa 'am/ bden par rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/ des de ltar mthong bas skyon myed
par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur nas/ spyi bor ltung bar myi 'gyur
te/ de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba myed do/ /de byang chub sems dpa' rigs kyi sa de la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/ /tshad myed pa bzhi
sgrub bo/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/ /de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do/ /
de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do/ /kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang / kun 'byung ba la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do/ /'gog pa mngon du byed kyang
'gog pa la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do/ /lam sgom yang lam la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do/ /gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du
mthong bar byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ stong pa nyid

gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang

chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par myi mthong ngo / /dngos po myed pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
ma byas/ dgra bcom pas ma byas/ phyir myi 'ong bas ma byas/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/ rgyun tu zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ma byas te/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis myi shes myi mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad/

rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dgra bcom pas kyang ma bgyis/ phyir myi 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang
chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/ chos de dag la 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba'o/ /'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o/ /'di dag
ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di dag ni lha'o/ /'di dag myi'o/ /las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
par 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni myir 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi ltar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ltar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni mtshe ma'i ltar 'gyur ro/ /
las 'dis ni dga' ldan gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni 'phrul dga'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni tshangs ris kyi lhar
'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni tshangs chen gyis lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni snang ba'i
lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni chung snang gyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni tshad myed snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni kun snang dang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las

'dis ni tshad myed dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni dge rgyas kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni chung che'i lhar gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni tshad myed che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni

'bras bu che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni myi che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni myi gdung ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni shin tu mthong ba'i lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni gya nom snang ba'i lhar
'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni 'og myin ni lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni
chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni lan
cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gyur ro/ /las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba 'am/ rnam par
dgod pa yang ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi
ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu mchi ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi

lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyis lhar skye ba 'am tshangs lha nye phan gyi ltar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba

'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i

lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i

lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/
rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
'gyur ba 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/
thob par gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab

'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa la ni las kyang myed/ bya ba yang myed/ 'bras bu yang myed na/ 'on

kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo/ /'phags pa'i chos la myi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du myi shes te/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du shes pas
de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ myi 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lha 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan

gyi lha 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor kyi lha 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lha 'am/ snang ba'i lha 'am/ chung snang gi lha 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lha 'am/ dge ba'i lha 'am/ chung dge ba'i lha 'am/ tshad myed dge

ba'i lha 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lha 'am/ che ba'i lha 'am/ chung che'i lha 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lha 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha 'am/ myi che ba'i lha 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lha 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha 'am/
gya nom snang ba'i lha 'am/ 'og myin gyi lha 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha 'am/ 'du shes myed

'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/ dngos po myed pa la ni las sam/ bya ba 'am/ 'bras bu myed de/ dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor
de la 'di skad du dngos po myed pa la ni bya ba gang yang myed de/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu 'gro ba 'am/
myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan

'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyis lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar

skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba

'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba
'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched

kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ de thob pas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang

myed do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lam dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin

nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ rang byang chub dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin
nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam ni dngos po myed pa ma yin pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos ma mchis
pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /rang byang chub ni dngos
po ma mchis pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du
sems/ dngos po myed pa'i chos zhig dngos po myed pa'i chos thob par byed snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na dngos

po myed pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan yang ma yin gzugs myed pa/ bstan tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ mtshan ma myed pa ste/

'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa'i sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon
par zhen pa myi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gyur pa/ myi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/
dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la mngon par zhen pa'o zhe nas/
mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis na ni mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/
sug las de kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las ci ste myi 'grol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang la gnas te/

byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang myed do/ /rab 'byor de lta bas na ci nas/ kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs

pa dang / mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe' bshad do/ /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmyi lam du mthong ba de gang la gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos
po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rmyi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/ rmyi lam mthong ba de la gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma
mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang / bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa 'am/
'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la rmyi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/
zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang rmyi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
ci rmyi lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
rmyi lam la lam bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis te/ brjod pa dang / tshig dang / sgra dang / yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang las mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/
byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu 'gro ba 'am/ myi dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das de ni gzhan du na/ byis pa rnams la slu ba ma gtogs par dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/ gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing / mngon par 'du bgyis pas
sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myi dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ de la lam bsgom pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa
yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam sgom pa de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ lam bsgom pas kun nas nyon mongs
par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
du sems/ nags stug po dang / ri dang / gcong rong dang / lung pa nas sgra brnyan byung na sgra brnyan de la mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/
byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ lha dang myir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgra

brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyi cing mngon par 'du bgyis na sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ lha dang myir skye
ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul

dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyis lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung

snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge
rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/
myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha'

yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba
lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan gyi lam gang la bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang myi
'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sgra
brnyan nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis pa lags/ lam gang bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma
mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smyig rgyu la chu myed par chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa dang / chu klung myed par chu klung gi 'du shes su
gyur pa dang / grong khyer myed pa la grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / bskyed mos tshal myed par bskyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas/
sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba
'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed

kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/

tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye

ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin

gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes
myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smyig rgyu la 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / myig gis log par mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang /
grong khyer dang / skyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na/ sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan

gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi

lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye

ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu

che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha'

yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye
bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms
pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/
bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ lam gang bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi
'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snya du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma sna tshogs glang po'i tshogs sam/
rta'i tshogs sam/ glang gi tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs sam/ bud myed kyi tshogs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs mngon par sprul nas/ sgyu ma de la mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems
can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu gsum gyi lhar

skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye

phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun

snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang
ba 'am/ tshang myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang
ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye
mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ sgyu ma de la gang
gnas te/ sug las de gang mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi

ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/

gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung

snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che

ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya
nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i
skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la gang lam bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom
pa gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos la nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mdzad na/ sprul pa de la las gang mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi

skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye

ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/

snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/

dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba

'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar

skye ba 'am/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan
'das sprul pa de la dngos po ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa de la lam gang bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/

rnam par byang bar yong myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de la gang la la zhig
kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs

pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang myed pa de bzhin du/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag dang bdag gis bya ba la gnas shing / sems can rnams kun nas

nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/ yang dag pa mthong ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba myed do/ /ji ltar yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam
par byang bar 'gyur ba myed pa/ de bzhin du/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun bcu'o// //
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar
'gyur ba yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ yang dag pa ma mthong ba la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/ de ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis
pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon
mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar
gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas rnam par byang bar gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang
rung ste/ de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang / dbyings 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byor rnam par byang ba ste/ de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad gyis brjod kyi/
de ni brjod du myed cing smos su myed pa ste/ sgra dang tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ myig

yor lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmyi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang / chos thams

cad myig yor lta bu dang / chos thams cad smyig rgyu lta bu dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ rdzas ma mchis pa la/ bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /smon lam gyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
rdzogs par bya'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su

rdzogs par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs

su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong

ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa

nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
