bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po
yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /dpe byad
bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par
bya ste/ dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes bgyi bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang khyed kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmyi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor
lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag rmyi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig

yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rmyi lam
ni yang dag pa ma lags/ sgra brnyan ni yang dag pa ma lags/ myig yor ni yang dag pa ma lags/ smyig rgyu ni yang dag pa ma lags/ sprul pa ni yang dag pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par ma lags

pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la

spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang

gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang /

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang / myi 'jigs

pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyad

pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa

nyid la spyad pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la stong pa nyid la spyad

pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang / stobs lnga la spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

bzhi la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyad pa dang /
mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang /

myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwo brgyad pa/ rab 'byor de
ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na myed pa

rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang myi rgya'o/ /stobs rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /bsam gtan rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na

myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /myi 'jigs pa

rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang myi rgya'o/ /snying rje chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas ste/ 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus
byas pa'i chos kyis ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par myi nus so/ /rab 'byor 'on kyang chos de dag ni thams cad kyang lam bsgrub pa dang / lam bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/ 'bras
bu thob pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /chos de dag gi myi skye ba dang / myi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa yang de yin te/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po

bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong

pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid

dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dam/ mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo
rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/

dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /

don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa

nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po de dag
yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar myi nus pas/ de'i phyir de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bur shes so/ /myig yor lta bur shes so/ /smyig rgyu lta bur

shes so/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes so/ /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes

so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmyi lam

lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu

lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong

pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /

sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor

lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu

dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa

lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe myi

dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po

myed pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam

lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes

so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes

so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /

sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /

sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu

dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang /

smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang /

smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu

dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu

dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta

bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang /

sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang /

sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta

bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang /

smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra

brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /

myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta

bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang /

smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta

bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig

rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang /

smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang /

sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu

lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu

lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang /

smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so/ /sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor

lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang rmyi lam la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/ /sgra brnyan la spyod do/ /

zhes bya bar shes so/ /myig yor la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/ /smyig rgyu la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/ /sgyu ma la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/ /sprul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so/ /de bas na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe myig yor lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ smyig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams

dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par

byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung

du myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang

gzung du myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang

gzung du myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzung du myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzung du

myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /stobs rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzung du myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /gzugs

myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzung du myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzung
du myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /byams pa chen po yang

gzung du myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang gzung du myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzung du myed do/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gzung du myed par

shes par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don tu gnyer to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gzung du myed cing dngos po myed pa ste/ rmyi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/
mig yor lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyi chos de dag ma shes mthong ba ma gtogs par gzung du myed pa'i chos kyis gzung du myed pa'i chos gang yang
thob par myi nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ sems dang

po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu gtong ngo / /tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du srung ngo / /bzod pa gang ci sgom
yang / sems can thams cad kyi don tu sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan gang ci la mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams
cad kyi don tu mnyam par gzhog go/ /shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu sgom ste/ bdag gi don tu ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang sems can myed pa la
sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog myed pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su
gnas pa dang / gso' ba myed pa la gso' ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / skyes bu myed pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang zag myed pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /

shed can myed pa la shed can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po myed pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po myed

pa la byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong ba po myed pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong du 'jug pa po myed pa la slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po

myed pa la tshor ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor du 'jug pa po myed pa la tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes po myed pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po
myed pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grel te/ phyin ci log las rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba myed pa'i dbyings su 'god do/ /de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag
yongs su myi rgyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gyi 'du shes sam/ srog gi 'du shes sam/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang
zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi 'du shes sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ slong ba po'i 'du shes sam/ slong du 'jug
pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong pa po'i 'du shes yongs su myi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems
dang / 'bar ba dang / spros pa 'di dag btang nas/ spros pa myed pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mngon du spyod de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid kyang chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa myed la/ sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa myed pa la rab tu 'god de/ de ni
'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so
shes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so shes bya ba de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
'di lta ste/ chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmyigs pa ste/ gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed do/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na/ gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed de/ gang la gnyis kyang myed la/ myi gnyis pa yang myed pa ni thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa zhes

bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/ chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa myed do/ /spros pa myed pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba yang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dngos po myed pa dang /
dngos po myed pa la yang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / yongs su brjod pa myed pa 'di ni/ chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid ma
gtogs par yang dmyigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang myed de/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa 'am/ 'phags pa 'am/
chos gang gis kyang shes par myi rung zhing / yul ma yin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom
pa 'am/ rang byang chub 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la

mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na/ rab 'byor so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang

yin pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid dang myi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang myed do/ /de ltar

so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni rgyun tu

zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba myed de/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la

'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag myi dmyigs na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams
dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig

phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten
du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon
mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog
kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang
lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs
ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni rgyun

tu zhugs pa'o/ /'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o/ /'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod pa bgyid pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid myed
pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir/ chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ma mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skye gnas
yod par mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ myi yod par mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ mtshe
ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon
nam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi lha yod
par mngon nam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed dge ba'i
lha yod par mngon nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i
lha yod par mngon nam/ myi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ myi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'og
myin gyi lha yod par mngon nam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi
lha yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par
mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon
nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod
par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mngon nam/ stobs rnams
yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ bsam
gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams yod par mngon nam/
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod par mngon nam/ mngon par shes pa
rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams
yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par
mngon nam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon
nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod
par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod
par mngon nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang myi g.yo la/ chos rnams rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las myi
g.yo ba de bzhin du/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags
sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du brgyad pa yang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du
rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du
phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyang
chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo 'o/ /chos mnyam pa nyid las myi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de
bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
mtha' ste/ de nyid ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi
gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid
ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /
chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /

chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin

pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /

ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de nyid ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las myi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings

dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ de dag las

chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang myed do/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos

'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / myig gi

rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i

rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi

rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang /
sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel
bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems

dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /

'phags pa'i lan yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi

stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi

dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang /
'dus ma byas kyi khams te/ bcom ldan 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu myi 'dra ba/ gcig las gcig 'das pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos

nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te/ myig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i

chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/

dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang

gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/
myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi

'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos

nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mye'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams
kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam
par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mying dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/

skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i

chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang

gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/

phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus

byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid

kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang gi mtshan nyid

stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen

po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad

bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi
chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags/ chos rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang
la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/ chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par myi nus na/
ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon myed par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon myed par zhugs nas/ nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
par bgyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par
brtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags/
dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad
du de ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad
pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos
mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/ mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji
ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid

ma yin nam/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong

pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs kyi

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid gang yin

pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i

rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin
pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid

stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong

pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chu'i
khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mye'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
nyid ma yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ma rig pa'i chos

nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mying dang
gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma

yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam/ srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma

yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/
'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang

yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos

nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
nyid ma yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong

pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang
yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa

de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/

myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de

nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid

gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid
gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro'i mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi

rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i
'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mye'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
dam/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/
rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mying dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ len pa'i

mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid

dam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi

mtshan nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid

dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid

dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan

nyid dam/ rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir
'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor

de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la yang so so'i skye bo myed/ so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang

ba myed/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba myed/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang brgyad pa myed/ brgyad pa las gud na
yang de myed/ de la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang phyir myi
'ong ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang dgra bcom pa myed/ dgra bcom pa las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang rang sangs rgyas myed/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na
yang de myed/ de la yang byang chub sems dpa' myed/ byang chub sems dpa' las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de myed
par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'dus byas
kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas dmyigs su myed do/ /'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmyigs su myed do/ /
rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi
ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs myed pa bstan tu myed pa/ thog pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du
brjod kyi/ don dam par ma yin te/ don dam pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed myed de/ lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na
yang don dam pa dmyigs su myed do/ /'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang myi g.yo la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las
le'u bdun cu rtsa gcig go/ // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de'i slad du chos gang la yang gang yang ci yang bgyid pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ci la yang bgyid pa ma mchis shing / ci la yang ma chags
pa ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang myi g.yo la/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyid pa dang /
don 'thun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ stong pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni gang la yang ci la yang byed pa yang myed/ ci yang myi byed pa yang myed de/ gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang myi g.yo la/
sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed
cing / sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis
'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gso' ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar
