byed cing / gso' ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa
nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gang zag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shes can gyi 'du
shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral

nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba po'i

'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas
stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi
'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang
phral ba nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes
dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / myig gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / myig
gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor

'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor

ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid

kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral ba nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sgra'i 'du shes dang phral

nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / dri'i 'du shes dang phral ba nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ro'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ro'i 'du shes dang phral

nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chos kyi 'du

shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel

pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar

byed cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong

pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /

yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis

'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i

'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te

reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis

'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor

ba las 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du

shes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /

yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral

nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / mye'i khams

kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mye'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang
phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ma rig pa'i 'du
shes dang bral bar byed cing / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang
phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
pa dang / mying dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mying dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang
bral bar byed cing / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/

stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sred pa'i 'du shes dang

bral bar byed cing / sred pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / len pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / len pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis
'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral
bar byed cing / skye ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid

kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong
pa yin yang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur myi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'du shes 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor la la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /sprul pa de la

gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de gnyis

ka yang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ de ci'i phyir slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab par mdzad/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / sprul pa gnyis ka yang stong pa nyid la dmyigs

su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o/ /gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi pa dang / dbang

po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par
thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa
lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o/ /la la ni rang
sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/ /
la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcol ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba/ rgyun tu zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/
bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bskyed pa 'am/
bkag pa'i chos gang yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang la skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed pa de ni ma sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ myi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni ma sprul pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las myi g.yo la/
gnyis su yang myi dmyigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu myed do/ /zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das myi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul
par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas
rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas
te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis
stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po myed par 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor 'di
la dngos po yod pa yang myed/ dngos po myed pa yang myed/ ngo bo nyid kyang myed/ gzhan gyi dngos po yang myed na/ de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos nyid myi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// //
@#/ /bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/ /thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ /skye rga na 'chi'i rba klong 'khrug pa yi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro kun myur sgrol shog /
bka' 'gyur 'di yongs su rdzogs pa rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa drug pa'i spyan sngar gtugs te dag par zhus nas slar par gyi tshogs kyang dag par bgyis so// //dge'o// //
